title: Midnight☆Children
original_name: ミッドナイト ☆ チルドレン
sinopse: It’s a story about a girl who lost her every memory. One stormy night a sudden meeting changes her life forever. She starts anew while still trying to set the pieces of the puzzle that was once her life. Soon after, a love that puts everything on a line is born in the girl’s heart. (Source: JShoujo)
